item.title: Python
item.description: 字典扩展类 原来需要这样用：dic['website'] = 'taobao.com' 有了这个类，可以这样用：dic.websites = 'taobao.com' class EasyAccessDict(dict): def __getattr__(self,name): if name in self: return self[name] n=easyaccessdict() super().__setitem__(name, n) return n def __getitem__(self,name): if name not in self: super().__setitem__(name,nicedict()) return super().__getitem__(name) def __setattr__(self,name,value): super().__setitem__(name,value)
